scripts.start: webpack --mode="production" && npm run start-philip & npm run start-john & npm run start-jav & nodemon server/index.js
scripts.start-dev: npm run start-philip & npm run start-john & npm run start-jav & nodemon server/index.js & webpack --watch --mode="development"
scripts.db:seed: npm run db:seed-philip && npm run db:seed-john && npm run db:seed-jav
scripts.db:seed-philip: cp APIs/philipService.js philipService/APIs/unsplash.js && node philipService/database/seed.js && rm philipService/APIs/unsplash.js
scripts.db:seed-john: cp APIs/johnService.js johnService/keys.js && node johnService/database/seed.js && rm johnService/keys.js
